attributes.action: take polluting cars off the road and swap them for new stock piled cars they cant sell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: solve 2 problems in one , all cars over a certain age, that pollute the air  daily , take them and swap them for brand new cars that are being stock piled , this will not only cut pollution it will also give the car industry a welcome boost , the government is about to give out loans , to the car industry , which like the bank bail out , we the tax payer are not going to get back .

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
